title: Data Scientist – Machine Learning, NLP and ImageExpert
description:
Come join as at NOVARTIS, we are looking for exceptional data scientists to design and execute data and analytics use cases for COE Data & Analytics. Can you keep pace with open source revolution in AI, work alongside Digital/Data leaders and partner with business stakeholders to support Novartis transformation journey? If YES, then we want to hear from you!
Your responsibilities:
In this newly created role, you will:
Innovate and recommend advanced predictive analytics, computational science, Natural Language Processing (NLP), machine learning and deep learning techniques to answer research questions and synthesize insights that achieve business objectives.
Establish scalable, efficient, automated solutions for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation and model implementation. Work to translate prototypes into new products, services, and features and provide guidelines for large-scale implementation.
Build and fine tune algorithms that scale up from small-scale proof-of-concept stage to full production systems
Build knowledge artifacts of real business problems that were solved with advanced analytics techniques which can be published in journals
Why consider Novartis?
750 million. That’s how many lives our products touch. And while we’re proud of that fact, in this world of digital and technological transformation, we must also ask ourselves this: how can we continue to improve and extend even more people’s lives?
We believe the answers are found when curious, courageous and collaborative people like you are brought together in an inspiring environment. Where you’re given opportunities to explore the power of digital and data. Where you’re empowered to risk failure by taking smart risks, and where you’re surrounded by people who share your determination to tackle the world’s toughest medical challenges.

We are Novartis. Join us and help us reimagine medicine.

Minimum requirements
What you’ll bring to the role:
An advanced degree (master’s or doctoral) in a highly quantitative field including but not limited to Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Operations Research, Biomedical Engineering, Computational Physics, Electrical Engineering
Three or more years of relevant experience in Image/NLP/DS story telling
Experience conducting end-to-end analysis for large scale data sets
Cross-industry experience highly preferred and previous experience in either pharma, biotech or healthcare desired.
